00030     struct DocExtentListMemoryBuilderSegment {
00031       DocExtentListMemoryBuilderSegment( char* b, char* d, char* c ) {
00032         base = b;
00033         data = d;
00034         capacity = c;
00035       }
00036 
00037       char* base;
00038       char* data;
00039       char* capacity;
00040     };
